definition: prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])

sentences.english: The cases were reported in different health districts of the capital, Abidjan.
sentences.chinese: 这两例分别是由首都阿比让不同卫生地区报告的。

sentences.english: The battle for Abidjan will be decisive.
sentences.chinese: 阿比让的战斗将是决定性的。

sentences.english: The resolution also bans the use of heavy weapons around the city of Abidjan.
sentences.chinese: 该决议还禁止在阿比让周边地区使用重武器。

sentences.english: There were explosions and gunfire throughout Friday.
sentences.chinese: 周五一整天，阿比让都弥漫着爆炸声和枪炮声。

sentences.english: Earlier, he imposed an immediate overnight curfew on Abidjan.
sentences.chinese: 此前，他下令立即在阿比让实施夜间宵禁。

sentences.english: I'm in the suburbs of Abidjan, very empty, very quiet.
sentences.chinese: 我正在阿比让郊区，这里非常空旷，非常寂静。

sentences.english: He had been entrenched at the Abidjan residence with a band of loyal fighters.
sentences.chinese: 他和一伙效忠他的军人在阿比让的住所固守。

sentences.english: Chic flash abidjan has become the siren of west africa.
sentences.chinese: 时髦奢华的阿比让已成为西非纸醉金迷的迷魂窟。

definition: Dar es Salaam (former capital of Tanzania)
pinyin: Da2 lei4 si1 Sa4 la1 mu3
